column2: I am partial to the Impressionists and their use of light
column3: but I love how art can open your eyes.  Case in point: the Modern Wing.  Light
column5: and showcasing all sorts of artistic expression
column6: it's a can't miss in this museum.  Whether you "get" the art behind a projection of a man tapping around a box to the beat of a metronome or of Jackson Pollack's abstract expressionistic paint spatters
column7: you understand that it means something...to the artist or to you.
